title: Polling for in-progress runs
description: Implement automatic polling for runs with status 'pending' or 'running'. The UI should update in real-time as the run progresses and stop polling when complete.
acceptance_criteria: Run detail page polls every 3 seconds for pending/running runs
Polling stops when status becomes terminal (completed, failed, cancelled)
UI updates smoothly without full page refresh
Progress indicator visible during active run
Results appear as they complete (if API supports partial results)
Runs list also refreshes for active runs
implementation_notes: Use React Query refetchInterval with conditional
Consider WebSocket for true real-time in future
